Name: Basel
description:
Basel, who appears in the photo, is a 24-year-old refugee living in a camp near Dier Al Balah, Gaza Strip. He is a single young man who lives with his family. He tries so hard to help them in living expenses.

Basel recently opened a small restaurant for falafel and chickpeas in the camp where he lives. It's a good business there because there's no other restaurant near him. He went to Palestine for Credit and Development FATEN to request a US dollar loan to buy food materials and some of the tools he needs in his work. He hopes you will help and fund his loan.
